messages.content: What is the purpose of ComfyUI Style Plugin?
The ComfyUI Style Plugin is a simple plugin that allows users to import A1111 CSV styles into ComfyUI prompts.
How is the ComfyUI Style Plugin installed?
To install the plugin, you need to clone the repository into the `custom_nodes` folder in ComfyUI.
What is required to add new styles to the plugin?
To add new styles, place the CSV or JSON file into the `styles` folder in the repository.
What is the name of the node included in the plugin?
Could you provide an example of how to use the plugin?
Yes, here's an example of how to use the plugin: ![Example scenario](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chakib-belgaid/Comfyui_Prompt_styler/main/example.png)
What is one known issue with the plugin?
One known issue is a visual bug where not all buttons are visible, which can be fixed by simply resizing the box.
From where were the styles downloaded?
The styles for this plugin are downloaded from the [Dice repository](https://civitai.com/user/DiceAiDevelopment).
